As part of the validation process, you may find issues with the model documentation that must be resolved. To indicate that there is an issue and to track the resolution, you add a new finding. 

- Findings are logged with your model documentation. 
- You can add findings both on the main documentation overview page and in each documentation section.

:::: {.content-visible unless-format="revealjs"}
1. [Log in to the {{< var vm_platform >}}]({{< var vm_url >}}).
::::

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Inventory**.

1. Select a model by clicking on it or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.

1. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **Documentation**. 

You can now either log a finding on this overview page, or via a specific documentation section. Both methods will allow you to associate a finding with a documentation section.
